
### self-replicating malware  {.smaller}



* attacker's problem: <br>getting malware to <em>run where they want</em>
* some options: 

* connect to machine and install it there
* send to someone
* convince someone else to send it to someone

### recall: kinds of malware  {.smaller}



* viruses --- infects <em>other programs</em>
* [worms]{.fragment fragment-index=3 .custom .myem-only} --- own malicious programs
* [trojans]{.fragment fragment-index=4 .custom .myem-only} --- useful (looking) program that also is malicious
* [rootkit]{.fragment fragment-index=2 .custom .myem-only} --- silent control of system
